metadata.synopsis: Generic reactions to Selune locations that aren't specifically shrines or altars. Such as corpses of Selunites and the Selunite outpost in the Underdark.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter a Selunite place that isn't a shrine or altar that doesn't have custom reactivity already.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Was anything I was taught about Selûne true...?
0.context: NodeContext: On looking at something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Of the moonwitch. Ought to be burned.
2.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: Selûnite. Strange... once, I would have been repelled. Now, I don't know.
3.context: NodeContext: On looking at something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: Selûnite. Once my enemy, now the enemy of my enemy...
4.context: NodeContext: On looking at something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: Sometimes I still catch myself scoffing at anything Selûnite... old habits die hard.
5.context: NodeContext: On looking at something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: Selûne worship... imagine being so desperate as to turn to her.
6.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

7.speaker: Shadowheart
7.text: Selûnite. An offence to the eyes.
7.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to something related to Selune (undetermined - ie a Selunite corpse, item, etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.
